thread.title: Bolt Ups: The First Dedicated Social Media Site for Every Motor Vehicle Enthusiast Debuts at SEMA 2015
thread.title_full: Bolt Ups: The First Dedicated Social Media Site for Every Motor Vehicle Enthusiast Debuts at SEMA 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Bolt Ups: The First Dedicated Social Media Site for Every Motor Vehicle Enthusiast Debuts at SEMA 2015
text:
Boltups.com
Gearheads, car lovers, vehicle geeks, and performance and aftermarket enthusiasts now have a social media destination they can call their own: Boltups.com. It is the first and only site where people who live the aftermarket and performance lifestyle can interact with one another and share their own content, and where aftermarket product providers can influence future parts and accessory sales.
SANTEE, Calif. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Gearheads, car lovers, vehicle geeks, and performance and aftermarket enthusiasts now have a social media destination they can call their own: Boltups.com .
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278650LOGO
Boltups.com is the social media platform for like-minded motor aficionados and the parts and accessories makers that bring their vehicles and vessels to life.
The site app allows powersports fans to connect with one another and professionals in the industry, promoting online social collaboration and enhancing aftermarket industry commerce.
"With millions of motorsports enthusiasts throughout the U.S., we recognized that there was no one comprehensive social sharing website for this industry," says Mike Sieniarecki , President of Bolt Ups, LLC. "We're building an expansive online community where people who live the aftermarket and performance lifestyle can interact with one another and share their own content. But we also want to help stimulate aftermarket sales."
Pinterest for gearheads
Members of Boltups.com upload, save, and manage photos and videos of their own and other favorite rides. But photo posting and sharing is just the beginning. Users will be able to post classified ads; promote news, clubs and events; and socially network via blogging and vlogging to share their interests in one all-inclusive placeâ€¦ including their builds and projects.
"The centerpiece of Bolt Ups is the 'My Garage' feature, which gives members the capability to share detailed information about what they're creating and the parts they're using," says Sieniarecki. "This feature opens up many more conduits for aftermarket product providers to share, inform and influence future parts and accessory sales."
Likewise, service providers -- repair shops, parts stores, services facilities, and online vendors -- can seamlessly integrate their products, services and messages into the content they share, allowing products to be aligned with their ideal audience and expanding their marketing toward new customers.
Any Motor, Every Playground
Any element can be a playground for motor vehicles and vessels. So, Boltups.com has specific sections that make it easy for users to narrow searches to four distinct playgrounds: Dirt , Asphalt , H2O and Snow.
"Boltups.com is motor agnostic," adds Sieniarecki. "Whether it's cruising down the highway in your sports car, boating on the weekends, playing in the dirt on a motorcycle, or barreling down a snowy trail, Boltups.com will connect you to the group of people that share your passion."
Bolt Ups Mobile
The powersports community doesn't sit still and neither does Bolt Ups. The Bolt Ups iOS and Android apps are available now. Both share the features of the online site plus a few more. Not only can users search through the latest vehicle content, but also the mobile apps' Instagram-like feature will upload photos to Bolt Ups or any other social media site.
Boltups .com at SEMA
Visit Boltups.com at The 2015 SEMA Show at booth numbers 90303 (Inside) and 61000 (Outside), and at SEMA Ignited 2015.
About Bolt Ups
Boltups.com is the first comprehensive social media destination for motor and vehicle enthusiasts, serving consumers and the aftermarket industry. Bolt Ups, LLC is a wholly owned subsidiary of Sienergy Holdings Group.
